title: Employer education about caregiver employee realities
description: Employer education about caregiver employee realities
content:
Scenario: Employer education about caregiver employee realities
    Given employers often don't understand caregiver demands
    And ignorance leads to policies that exclude caregivers
    When the workplace_elohim advocates for caregiver employees
    Then it should educate employers about caregiving intensity
    And it should demonstrate caregivers are valuable employees
    And it should show accommodation benefits retention
    And employers should understand caregiving as widespread need
    And workplace culture should become caregiver-friendly
